descriptions.content: A Brief Report of Some Jirel Vocabulary by James Hamill, H. Sidky, Ronald H. Spielbauer, Janardan Subedi, J. Blangero, and S. Williams-Blangero (PDF). Preliminary Ethnosemantics of the Avifauna Vocabulary in Jirel by J. Hamill, H. Sidky, Ronald H. Spielbauer, Janardan Subedi, Robin Singh, J. Blangero, and S. Williams-Blangero (PDF).
descriptions.title: An Overview of the Jirel Dialect
